# AoC 2022
Here are my solutions for [Advent of Code 2022](https://adventofcode.com/2022). They're not the most efficient or elegant but I'm just hoping to do as many as I can.

- [Day 1: Calorie Counting](https://adventofcode.com/2022/day/1), [code](./01.ipynb)
- [Day 2: Rock Paper Scissors](https://adventofcode.com/2022/day/2), [code](./02.ipynb)
- [Day 3: Rucksack Reorganization](https://adventofcode.com/2022/day/3), [code](./03.ipynb)
- [Day 4: Camp Cleanup](https://adventofcode.com/2022/day/4), [code](./04.ipynb)
- [Day 5: Supply Stacks](https://adventofcode.com/2022/day/5), [code](./05.ipynb)
